Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, east of the Great Fellowship Hall.
Room.LongDescription: The Fellowship Hall is a meeting building for the Fellowship, a philosophical group of thinkers whose alternative philosophies have brought on mass ostracation by both the general public and many of the religious orders in Oceancrest. Strange sacrificial rituals are said to have taken place within the halls of the building.
